Articles.Content: Seen a few incidients where Kerbals have been able to survive crashes by ejecting (EVA'ing) right before impact, but at best one survives. Maybe we could get a mod that enables the entire crew to bailout together? Maybe Ctrl-E 3 times or something similar to flight sims would work.
I guess such stunts should be left for Danny, not for the general population.

The old Vanguard EVA Parachutes included a part that would eject all crew with an action group. It's reported compatible up to 0.25 without needing any updates, although I don't want to guess what it will do in 0.90 if you eject before unlocking EVA.
